# Acidity
<a href="https://numbat.dev/?q=%23+Compute+the+pH+%28acidity%29+of+a+solution+based%0A%23+on+the+activity+of+hydrogen+ions%0A%23%0A%23+https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FPH%0A%0Afn+pH_acidity%28activity_hplus%3A+Molarity%29+-%3E+Scalar+%3D%0A++++-+log10%28activity_hplus+%2F+%28mol+%2F+L%29%29%0A%0Aprint%28pH_acidity%285e-6+mol+%2F+L%29%29%0A"><i class="fa fa-play"></i> Run this example</a>

``` numbat
# Compute the pH (acidity) of a solution based
# on the activity of hydrogen ions
#
# https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PH

fn pH_acidity(activity_hplus: Molarity) -> Scalar =
    - log10(activity_hplus / (mol / L))

print(pH_acidity(5e-6 mol / L))
```
